alert.note: Alert for Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 7:04PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Johnson County through 745 PM MDT... At 702 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles west of Powder River Rest Area, or 19 miles southeast of Buffalo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Powder River Rest Area around 720 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 90 between mile markers 72 and 85. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent lightning and brief heavy rain is also occurring with this storm.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
